extendedInfo.description: Bring live cricket to your Android. Every game covered live, with 36 different views into the action. Get the live score, commentary, batting, fielding and bowling charts and stats, photos, match-reports, and much more.- The Fastest Scorecard- Ball-by-ball commentary- Wagon-wheel, manhattan, partnerships- Bowling spells, wickets- Catches, run-outs, misses- Photos- Highlights- Squads, stats- Pitch, venue, weather reports- Video reports by experts

reviews.title: Always Crashed!!!
reviews.comment: Every time the app crashed & have to force close. Internet connection problem also exists. May be a update can fix the bugs. Otherwise good app. Specially for move to SD feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Keeps saying connect to internet even though its connected. Tried uninstalling and then installing again but says the same thing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error connecting
reviews.comment: I installed it just now and when tried to open app, it says it can not connect to internet. I have good wifi n 4g and i am surfing net successfully for through apps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not at all live, WI was 58/1 still was showing 53/0. Not expected from Network 18, Ndtv is much better.... Guys get widget.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Even though I\'m connected to the Internet, app keeps asking me to connect. Major flaw that should never have made it to release.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never updates videos n old look of app
reviews.comment: Why u guys don\'t upload videos in HD .which are normally on crickenext website. Have to go to website everyday. Also apps overall look is poor n old fashioned. Please compete with CnnIbn own app and NDTV. I know cnnIbnn owns cricketNext. Once done i will give 5 star again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Connection issue
reviews.comment: Does not work. Keeps saying connect to Internet even though it\'s connected?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Decently done. Needs reduction of clicks. For example even for completed matches I have to goto small scorecard and then the complete one!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Wifi is on using facebook and everything but constantly giving error cannot connect to internet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Bad App
reviews.comment: Once you download this app in any android device you will face so many problems in device like hanging unnecessary force close and etc. then you have to restart the device and your device works perfectly, again you try this app and you face the same problem in your device. you should not try this app and if you are using then immediately uninstalled this application.     then can solve this by updating the application. and i think same problem comes with IBNLive. i have test this app in several devices that why i found this problem.  Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5min delay
reviews.comment: In live matches it has approx 5min delay,otherwise good,but recently this app couldn\'t connect to net though I am already connected,so I am uninstalling...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t download...
reviews.comment: Keeps giving me connection error for both WiFi and 3G. Waste of time. Don\'t download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Slow updates.. poor cluttered interface.. prefer !works cricket pro.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dany
reviews.comment: Worest app ever had..forced close always .gives wrong score unintaling .anyoing appa
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cricket good application
reviews.comment: wow good feature move to SD.cricket score showing good.live,upcoming,recent ,squad overall best cricket application.. everyone must have this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flaky
reviews.comment: Kept complaining of not being connected to the internet even though on WiFi.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Iceman
reviews.comment: Can\'t connect I\'ve got good WiFi and internet signal.

reviews.title: Good but requires a lot better UI
reviews.comment: Its requires a good UI..also live updates section is missing,a separate section. Make a widget too.why not a widget?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well.
reviews.comment: Bad reviews coming from crap phones.

reviews.comment: Good, but not as fast as the cricbuzz app. HTC Desire (BSNL 3G)
